item.title: RocketQA : An Optimized Training Approach to Dense Passage Retrieval for Open-Domain Question Answering
item.description: Abstract + Introduction difficult to effectively train a dual-encoder for dense passage retrieval retriever needs to identify positive passages for each question from a large collection there might be a large number of unlabeled positives (IR資料集可能有錯誤) it is expensive to acquire large-scale training data for open-domain QA 反正就是large scale 的open-d

item.title: A Discriminative Semantic Ranker for Question Retrieval
item.description: Abstract + Introduction First-stage ranker 的新架構 DenseTrans - Transformer + DenseNet 的融合物 主要的任務是question retrieval，找出與使用者輸入相似的問題，類似FAQ Term-based的方式會
